wikipedia_page.main: Louis H. Jackson (1904–1960) was a British film producer. He oversaw production at British National Films during the 1940s.

response: This is a list of films released by the British studio British National Films between 1935 and 1948. The company was financially backed by Lady Yule, and during the 1940s production was overseen by John Baxter and subsequently by Louis H. Jackson. Many of the films produced by the company were made at the Elstree Studios complex.
